insert into tec_score(grade_id , tec_id , designer , personal , coordinate , `month` , `year` ,`date`) value
(#{item.gradeId} , #{item.tecId} , #{item.designer} ,#{item.personal} ,#{item.coordinate} ,#{month} , YEAR(CURDATE()) , #{item.date})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE designer = values(designer), personal = values(personal), coordinate = values(coordinate), `month` = values(`month`), `year` = values(`year`), `date` = values(`date`)
mapper.update: insert into tec_score_backups(grade_id , tec_id , designer , personal , coordinate , `month` , `year` , `date`) select * from tec_score
mapper.select: select gt.id as gtId , CASE gt.state when 0 then "false" when 1 then "true" end as state , d.name as department, t.name as technology, s.designer , s.personal , s.coordinate from `user` u, technology t, department d, grade_tec gt left join tec_score s on s.gt_id = gt.id where gt.grade_id = #{id} and gt.tec_id = t.id and u.id = gt.grade_id and t.did = d.id

SELECT distinct m.department, m.technology, m.score FROM( SELECT d.NAME AS department, t.NAME AS technology, AVG(( s.designer + s.personal + s.coordinate )/ 3) AS score ,s.tec_id FROM tec_score s, `user` u, department d, technology t WHERE u.did = d.id AND s.tec_id = u.tid GROUP BY s.tec_id) as m, `user` u
u.id = #{id} and m.tec_id = u.tid
